template_input_params.name: openstack_image_name
template_input_params.label: Openstack Image name
template_input_params.description: The name of the image to be used for deploy operations.

template_input_params.name: openstack_flavor_name
template_input_params.label: Openstack Flavor name
template_input_params.description: The name of the flavor to be used for deploy operations.

template_input_params.name: openstack_network_name
template_input_params.label: Openstack Network Name
template_input_params.description: The name of the network to be used for deploy operations.

template_input_params.name: openstack_IP_address
template_input_params.label: Openstack Network IP Address
template_input_params.description: Optional specific IPV4 Address to be used for deploy.

template_input_params.name: image_id_username
template_input_params.label: Openstack Image Username
template_input_params.description: The username to SSH into image ID

template_input_params.name: image_id_password
template_input_params.label: Openstack Image Password
template_input_params.description: The password of the username to SSH into image ID

template_input_params.name: number_of_instances
template_input_params.label: Number of Instances to deploy
template_input_params.description: The number of instances to provision.
